Edgar Andrade

Barranquilla, Colombia · +57 (301) 402-8598 · tremsdel@gmail.com

My Web journey began back in 2012, while i was studying Systems Engineering at the University, i found my passion for programming and Front end web development (As a very enthusiastic kid inspired by "The Facebook" movie and Steve Jobs). Fast forward in 2014 i was working as a freelancer building websites for friends and local companies using Javascript, HTML5 and CSS3 (Also using Bootstrap framework) and Wordpress.

Then i discovered the E-commerce world and used my knowledge to design and modify ecommerce websites for myself using Shopify, and i used that experience to help other people by selling my services and customizing their stores using the 3 big programming languages that i know. It was then, that i decided to go in deep as a programmer and software developer. I bought a complete JavaScript course to increase my knowledge, worked on a few projects and i knew that i was made to create solutions in this world to make a better place for us to live...

Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy the rest of my time playing the guitar, going out with my wife for a walk or eating, exercise my body and learn new stuff online!

When forced indoors, I watch Movies on Netflix, explore the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world and extend my knowledge through courses and Youtube videos.
